item.title: Prevent Distractions and Sharpen Your Focus
item.description: Distractions take attention away from what an operator needs to do when performing a task. Distractions can be external (such as noise) or internal (such as tiredness, rumination, or anxiety).
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)

item.title: Growth Mindset - the new psychology of success
item.description: Our mindset is essential when teaching ourselves new skills. Our perspective will have more of an impact on our chances of success than just about anything else.
item.author: rabby.mohiuddin@gmail.com (Golam Mohiuddin)
